an10.215:4.1: “A laywoman living at home with these ten qualities is not self-assured.
an10.215:4.13: A laywoman living at home with these ten qualities is not self-assured.
an10.215:5.1: A laywoman living at home with these ten qualities is self-assured.
an10.215:5.13: A laywoman living at home with these ten qualities is self-assured.”
